name: DHCP Server Error Failed Loading the CallOut DLL
description: This rule detects a DHCP server error in which a specified Callout DLL (in registry) could not be loaded
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND event.code:(1031 OR 1032 OR 1034) AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-DHCP\-Server)`
